mapper.select: select count(*) FROM t_office WHERE office_building = #{officeBuildingId}
select count(*) FROM t_office WHERE office_building = #{officeBuildingId} and type='B'
select count(*) FROM t_office WHERE shared_office_id = #{sharedOfficeId}
select count(*) FROM t_office WHERE shared_office_id = #{sharedOfficeId} and type='B'

( SELECT IFNULL(b.id,'') id, IFNULL(b.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(a.attention_type,'') type FROM t_office_building b LEFT JOIN t_attention a ON a.attention_label = b.id WHERE a.attention_user = #{id} AND a.attention_type='A' ) UNION ( SELECT IFNULL(b.id,'') id, IFNULL(b.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(a.attention_type,'') type FROM t_shared_office b LEFT JOIN t_attention a ON a.attention_label = b.id WHERE a.attention_user = #{id} AND a.attention_type='B')

SELECT IFNULL(o.id,'') id, IFNULL(o.floor,'') floor, IFNULL(o.door,'')door, IFNULL(o.area,'')area, IFNULL(o.state,'')state, IFNULL(f.`name`,'')`name`, IFNULL(fo.floor_id,'')fid FROM t_office o LEFT JOIN t_floor_to_office fo ON fo.office_id = o.id LEFT JOIN t_floor f ON f.id = fo.floor_id where o.id=#{id}
